title: Silent Witness
description: In this Dateline classic, Michelle Young, pregnant with her second child, is brutally murdered while her husband Jason is away on business. Who would kill this beloved young mother? Keith Morrison reports. Originally aired on NBC on March 30, 2012.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
